Key Match Events: India was down to 31 for 4 in the seventh over but managed to win the match with Kohli scoring an unbeaten 82 off 53
Post-Match Reflections: Kohli: ‘I have no idea how that happened’
Rohit: ‘The best innings Kohli has played for India’
Miscellaneous Highlights: India will head to Sydney to play the Netherlands on Thursday
Pakistan will fly to Perth to regroup and face Zimbabwe on Thursday
Others: The match was played at the Melbourne Cricket Ground (MCG)
